text: Walking the Streets of Moscow () is a 1963 Soviet comedy movie directed by Georgiy Daneliya.Веселый грустный человек: неизвестный Георгий ДанелияЯ ШАГАЮ ПО МОСКВЕ It stars Aleksei Loktev, Nikita Mikhalkov, and Galina Polskikh. ==Actors== *Aleksei Loktev – Volodya *Nikita Mikhalkov – Kolka *Galina Polskikh – Alyona *Yevgeny Steblov – Sasha *Irina Titova – Sveta *Irina Miroshnichenko – Katya == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1963 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Georgiy Daneliya
title: Walking the Streets of Moscow
